title: PSSSB Jail Warder Recruitment 2025 (500 Posts) Matron Notification Apply Online
description: Punjab Police Jail Warder Recruitment 2025 PSSSB recently released notification for Jail Warder Male & Matron for 500 posts Punjab Police Recruitment 2025 for Jail Warder Posts candidates with 12th class can apply online Punjab Jail Warder Vacancy 2025 Online application Punjab SSSB Jail Warder Marton Recruitment 2025 Apply from 30 July 2025 PSSSB Jail Warder Recruitment 2025 Advt No. 07 of 2025 Latest Updated 29.07.2025: Punjab SSSB Has started the Online Application Process for 500 Jail War...
